# Bertrand Group | Brand & Web Systems
> Brand, web, and systems studio based in Greater Sudbury, Ontario, Canada.

## About
Bertrand Group | Brand & Web Systems is a brand, web, and systems studio led by Scott Bertrand and Devin Major (full-stack developer/architect). Based in Greater Sudbury, Ontario, the studio serves businesses across Northern Ontario and Canada. The studio specializes in clear, structured brand and web systems work — helping businesses that value clarity over complexity.

## Services

### Conversation (Entry layer for new clients)
- **Guided Intake** — Free, form-based (5–10 min). Asynchronous intake to assess fit and determine next steps.
- **Clarity Session (Brand / Web / Systems)** — $145 CAD, ~45 minutes. Live video working session with diagnosis, direction, and written recap.
- **Technical Feasibility Check** — Free, verbal, by request. Focused assessment for projects with technical unknowns.

### Build (Fixed-scope work with clear timelines and public pricing)
- **Starter Site** — $750 CAD, delivered in 1 business day. A fast-launch website built for speed and simplicity.
- **One-Page System Redesign** — $1,250 CAD, delivered in 2–3 business days. A fully custom, code-based single-page website. No templates, no builders.
- **Brandmark & Visual Identity** — $950 CAD, delivered in 5–7 business days. Primary brandmark with supporting marks and visual direction.

### Transformation (Strategic, discovery-led engagements)
- Brand System Reset — Strategic realignment of positioning, messaging, and visual system.
- Digital Platform Build — Multi-page website or application built as a brand platform.
- Integrated Brand + Platform — End-to-end brand and digital platform built together.

Transformation engagements use private pricing and require a discovery process to begin.
